Text: Looks like I will going to TvTeam from now on if EZTV will not up AVI's!

Just go to TvTeam for the AVI.
http://thepiratebay.se/user/TvTeam/
You just need to use a free player (like GOM, VLC or others), or download a pack of codecs. The image and audio is better in MP4, and even better in MKV. Good luck with that.
